mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (1) AS TOTAL, c.DISPLAY_NAME, r.EXAMINE_RESULT, A .SEQ_NO, c.USERID FROM ( SELECT U .DISPLAY_NAME, U . ID AS userid, r.* FROM (select SU.id,SU.DISPLAY_NAME from ACCOUNT_MANAGER_PARAMETER amp,SYS_USER SU where AMP.USER_ID = SU.ID)u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.*, b.USER_ID FROM CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO c, BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION b WHERE c.CUSTOMER_ID = b. ID ) r ON r.USER_ID = U . ID ORDER BY U . ID ) c, ( SELECT r1.*, r2.CURRENT_STATUS, r2.CURRENT_PROCESS, r2.EXAMINE_RESULT FROM WF_process_RECORD r1 LEFT JOIN WF_STATUS_QUEUE_RECORD r2 ON r1.WF_STATUS_QUEUE_RECORD = R2. ID ) r, WF_STATUS_INFO s, ( SELECT * FROM NODE_AUDIT WHERE NODE_TYPE = 'Product' ) A WHERE r.CURRENT_STATUS = s. ID AND s.STATUS_CODE = A . ID AND c.SERIAL_NUMBER = r.CURRENT_PROCESS GROUP BY ( A .SEQ_NO, r.EXAMINE_RESULT, c.USERID, c.DISPLAY_NAME ) ORDER BY c.USERID, A .SEQ_NO

SELECT COUNT (1) AS TOTAL, c.org_name, r.EXAMINE_RESULT, A .SEQ_NO, c.org_id FROM ( SELECT U .DISPLAY_NAME, U . ID AS userid, u.deptId, u.deptName, u.org_id, u.org_name, r.* FROM (select SU.id,SU.DISPLAY_NAME,SD.ID as deptId,SD.NAME as deptName ,so.id as org_id,so.NAME as org_name from ACCOUNT_MANAGER_PARAMETER amp,SYS_USER SU,SYS_DEPT_USER sdu,SYS_DEPARTMENT sd,SYS_ORGANIZATION so where AMP.USER_ID = SU.ID and SU.id = SDU.USER_ID and SDU.DEPT_ID = SD.ID and SD.ORG_ID = SO.ID )u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.*, b.USER_ID FROM CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO c, BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION b WHERE c.CUSTOMER_ID = b. ID ) r ON r.USER_ID = U . ID ORDER BY U . ID ) c, ( SELECT r1.*, r2.CURRENT_STATUS, r2.CURRENT_PROCESS, r2.EXAMINE_RESULT FROM WF_process_RECORD r1 LEFT JOIN WF_STATUS_QUEUE_RECORD r2 ON r1.WF_STATUS_QUEUE_RECORD = R2. ID ) r, WF_STATUS_INFO s, ( SELECT * FROM NODE_AUDIT WHERE NODE_TYPE = 'Product' ) A WHERE r.CURRENT_STATUS = s. ID AND s.STATUS_CODE = A . ID AND c.SERIAL_NUMBER = r.CURRENT_PROCESS GROUP BY ( c.org_name, r.EXAMINE_RESULT, A .SEQ_NO, c.org_id ) ORDER BY c.org_id, A .SEQ_NO
